title: Finding Somewhere to Belong
description: Anna is a lone wolf in a life that she has worked hard to build for herself. All of that comes crashing down one day with the murder of the one woman who has always been there for her. Can she find justice for Evelyn and save herself from the same fate?During Anna's search for justice she stumbles onto a wolf pack whose goals align with her own and she starts to make friends and allies with other wolves. The more time she spends with them, the more realizes how much has been missing from her life.She starts to realize how empty her life has been when six wolves in particular take her under their wing and make it their goal to bring her into the fold.Can Anna work through her issues and be accepted into a pack? Will she finally find a place where she belongs and a pack that can give her the acceptance she craves?*This is a slow-burn RH romance series.
author: C.C. Masters
